argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | vci.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` W ) |
| 2 |  | vci.2 | |- S = ( 2nd ` W ) |
| 3 |  | vci.3 | |- X = ran G |
| 4 |  | #P_negcl | |- ( B e. CC -> -u B e. CC ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_vcdir | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ -u B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A + -u B ) S C ) = ( ( A S C ) G ( -u B S C ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl3anr2 | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A + -u B ) S C ) = ( ( A S C ) G ( -u B S C ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_negsub | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A + -u B ) = ( A - B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) -> ( A + -u B ) = ( A - B ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( A + -u B ) = ( A - B ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A + -u B ) S C ) = ( ( A - B ) S C ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A S C ) G ( -u B S C ) ) = ( ( A - B ) S C ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_mulm1 | |- ( B e. CC -> ( -u 1 x. B ) = -u B ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_ad2antrl | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( -u 1 x. B ) = -u B ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( -u 1 x. B ) S C ) = ( -u B S C ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_vcass | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( -u 1 e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( -u 1 x. B ) S C ) = ( -u 1 S ( B S C ) ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_mp3anr1 | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( -u 1 x. B ) S C ) = ( -u 1 S ( B S C ) ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 17 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( -u B S C ) = ( -u 1 S ( B S C ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_3adantr1 | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( -u B S C ) = ( -u 1 S ( B S C ) ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A S C ) G ( -u B S C ) ) = ( ( A S C ) G ( -u 1 S ( B S C ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 11, 20 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A - B ) S C ) = ( ( A S C ) G ( -u 1 S ( B S C ) ) ) ) |
